mapper.update: update smbms_provider set proCode = #{procode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proName = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proDesc = #{prodesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proContact = #{procontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proPhone = #{prophone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proAddress = #{proaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proFax = #{profax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyby,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createBy, creationDate, modifyDate, modifyBy from smbms_provider where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact, proPhone, proAddress, proFax, createBy, creationDate, modifyDate, modifyBy from smbms_provider
